document.full_text: former imf chief dominique strauss-kahn remained under house arrest and armed guard on saturday in an apartment in new york's financial district that has become a tourist attraction.
document.title: strauss-kahn under house arrest in new york
lines_and_colors: former imf chief dominique strauss-kahn remained under house arrest and armed guard on saturday in an apartment in new york's financial district that has become a tourist attraction.
